verses.verse: I <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you that you <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G2821>vocation<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> you are <S%G2564>called,<s%>
With <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5012>lowliness<s%> and <S%G4236>meekness,<s%> with <S%G3115>long-suffering,<s%> <S%G430>forbearing<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> in <S%G26>love;<s%>
<S%G4704>Endeavoring<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1775>unity<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in the <S%G4886>bond<s%> of <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

There is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as you are <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling;<s%>
<S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G908>baptism,<s%>

<S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> and <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> and in you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
But to <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of us is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> When he <S%G305>ascended<s%> up <S%G5311>on<s%> <S%G5311>high,<s%> he <S%G162>led<s%> <S%G161>captivity<s%> <S%G162>captive,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1390>gifts<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G1161>(Now<s%> that he <S%G305>ascended,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is it but that he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2737>lower<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth?<s%>

He that <S%G2597>descended<s%> is the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G305>ascended<s%> up <S%G5231>far<s%> <S%G5231>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> that he might <S%G4137>fill<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things.)

And he <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G652>apostles;<s%> and <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G4396>prophets;<s%> and <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G2099>evangelists;<s%> and <S%G3588>some,<s%> <S%G4166>pastors<s%> and <S%G1320>teachers;<s%>
For the <S%G2677>perfecting<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G1248>ministry,<s%> for the <S%G3619>edifying<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G3360>Till<s%> we <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2658>come<s%> in the <S%G1775>unity<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and of the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to a <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> to the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G2244>stature<s%> of the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

That we from now <S%G3063>on<s%> be <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G2001>more<s%> <S%G3516>children,<s%> <S%G2831>tossed<s%> to and <S%G2831>fro,<s%> and <S%G4064>carried<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> with <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> of <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> by the <S%G2940>sleight<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> and cunning <S%G3834>craftiness,<s%> <S%G4314>whereby<s%> they <S%G3180>lie<s%> in <S%G3180>wait<s%> to <S%G4106>deceive;<s%>

But <S%G226>speaking<s%> the <S%G226>truth<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%> may <S%G837>grow<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> him in <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G2776>head,<s%> even <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

From <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G4883>fitly<s%> <S%G4883>joined<s%> <S%G4883>together<s%> and <S%G4822>compacted<s%> by that which <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G860>joint<s%> <S%G2024>supplies,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1753>effectual<s%> <S%G1753>working<s%> in the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G1520>every<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G3313>part,<s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G838>increase<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> to the <S%G3619>edifying<s%> of <S%G1438>itself<s%> in <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G5124>This<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3143>testify<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that you from now <S%G3371>on<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> not as <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G4043>walk,<s%> in the <S%G3153>vanity<s%> of their <S%G3563>mind,<s%>

Having the <S%G1271>understanding<s%> <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G526>alienated<s%> from the <S%G2222>life<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G52>ignorance<s%> that is in them, <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G4457>blindness<s%> of their <S%G2588>heart:<s%>

<S%G3748>Who<s%> being <S%G524>past<s%> <S%G524>feeling<s%> have <S%G3860>given<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> to <S%G2039>work<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> with <S%G4124>greediness.<s%>
But you have not <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
<S%G1489>If<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> be that you have <S%G191>heard<s%> him, and have been <S%G1321>taught<s%> by him, as the <S%G225>truth<s%> is in <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

That you <S%G659>put<s%> <S%G659>off<s%> <S%G2596>concerning<s%> the <S%G4387>former<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G5351>corrupt<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G539>deceitful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts;<s%>
And be <S%G365>renewed<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3563>mind;<s%>

And that you <S%G1746>put<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2936>created<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G3588>true<s%> <S%G225><s%> <S%G3742>holiness.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G659>putting<s%> <S%G659>away<s%> <S%G5579>lying,<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G1520>every<s%> <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G226>truth<s%> with his <S%G4139>neighbor:<s%> for we are <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> of <S%G240>another.<s%>
Be you <S%G3710>angry,<s%> and <S%G264>sin<s%> not: let not the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G1931>go<s%> <S%G1931>down<s%> on <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3950>wrath:<s%>
<S%G3383>Neither<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

Let him that <S%G2813>stole<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G2001>more:<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> let him <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> with his <S%G5495>hands<s%> the thing which is <S%G18>good,<s%> that he may <S%G2192>have<s%> to <S%G3330>give<s%> to him that <S%G5532>needs.<s%>

Let <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4550>corrupt<s%> <S%G3056>communication<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> but that <S%G1536>which<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> to the <S%G5532>use<s%> of <S%G3619>edifying,<s%> that it may <S%G1325>minister<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G191>hearers.<s%>

And <S%G3076>grieve<s%> not the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you are <S%G4972>sealed<s%> to the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G629>redemption.<s%>

Let <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4088>bitterness,<s%> and <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> and <S%G3709>anger,<s%> and <S%G2906>clamor,<s%> and <S%G988>evil<s%> <S%G988>speaking,<s%> be <S%G142>put<s%> away from you, with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2549>malice:<s%>

And be you <S%G5543>kind<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2155>tenderhearted,<s%> <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> for <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G1722>sake<s%> has <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> you.
